altername_name: Eis und Feuer Teil 1: Der Magier
name: Eis und Feuer: Der Magier
overview: A six-disk, German language only, adventure game with an excellent game font and a really nice challenge. A magician with dangerous magical powers rules over an enchanted valley. Only through clever combinations, questions and actions is it possible to defeat the magician and free the residents. Three double-sided floppy disks with 850 KB adventure and mystery! In more than 150 rooms there are over 70 species on different time planes.
